column1: # description: Miscellaneous metadata for neuroblastoma samples
#   bsf_id: scRNA-seq sample name extracted from the folder containing cellranger output
#   bsf_order: order of the sample for cellranger aggr (determines the numeric barcode suffix)
#   sample: clean sample name used for all analyses
#     IV: sporadic (wild-type MYCN and wild-type ATRXdel)
#   facs_X: cell counts from FACS characterization
#     HSPC: hematopoietic stem and precursor cells (CD45+ CD34+)
#   snp_array_id: sample name for SNP array data
